summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: user-facing labels were updated to "Lore and Knowledge" in the top nav and Lore page, and the Admin Dashboard sidebar now includes a "Lore and Knowledge" tab (fixing the prior "lure" typo). Diff also adds a new admin "Lore and Knowledge" management view that was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new Admin Dashboard content view for "Lore and Knowledge" management, including CMS-oriented copy ("Manage blog posts...", "Coming Soon" feature list) and a "View Public Page" button.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to correct the sidebar tab label/entry and the public-facing label "Lore and Knowledge"; it did not request adding a new admin management view or CMS-related UI/copy (and explicitly listed "Adding new blog CMS functionality" as a non-goal).
